import { keyboard } from "@testing-library/user-event/dist/keyboard"; import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; function Product_Detail(){ const param = useParams(); const [data,setData] = useState({}); const [img,setImg] = useState([]); // console.log(img) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:8080/laravel8/laravel8/public/api/product/detail/" + param.id ) .then(res=>{ let imgg = res.data.data.image; imgg = JSON.parse(imgg) setImg(imgg) setData(res.data.data) }) },[]); function renderData(){ if(Object.keys(data).length > 0){ return Object.keys(data).map((key,index)=>{ let images = data.image; let img = JSON.parse(images) return(
